DEMO_904_MSG_001: ́Hey! welcome back! You're here just in time!
DEMO_904_MSG_002: ̂Just in time? By the way, where is everyone?
DEMO_904_MSG_003_1: ́Everyone went up to the rooftop to watch the shooting star.
DEMO_904_MSG_008: ̅Just leave this to Ace, and you guys should go up to the rooftop.
DEMO_904_MSG_003_2: ̂We're about to go up there too. We're super excited!
DEMO_904_MSG_004: ̂I see. Hey Ace, sorry to bother you. But before you head up to the rooftop, could I ask you to do something?
DEMO_904_MSG_005: ́Hmm, I see. So basically, you want me to fix this mirror that wasn't fully restored so you guys can use it again?
DEMO_904_MSG_006: ́Ahh! Okay, I think I can work with this. You guys go watch the stars!
DEMO_904_MSG_007:
̅Hmmm... Okay then, I'll stay here and head up there with Ace later.
